languages.text: "Их смерти делают крепче нить, ведущую на волю. Это все, что мне нужно знать".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Ulfar: "The lying xenos are playing us like puppets... I sense new webs of foul intrigue weaving about our hands!"

languages.text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
languages.original_text: "Их смерти делают крепче нить, ведущую на волю. Это все, что мне нужно знать".

traits.locale_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr Tod stärkt den Faden, der zur Freiheit führt. Mehr muss ich nicht wissen."
languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Tod stärkt den Faden, der zur Freiheit führt. Mehr muss ich nicht wissen."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Leurs morts renforcent le fil qui mène à la liberté. C'est tout ce que j'ai besoin de savoir. »
languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."

traits.locale_text: « Leurs morts renforcent le fil qui mène à la liberté. C'est tout ce que j'ai besoin de savoir. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Sus muertes refuerzan el hilo que lleva a la libertad. Es todo cuanto necesito saber».
languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."

traits.locale_text: «Sus muertes refuerzan el hilo que lleva a la libertad. Es todo cuanto necesito saber».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らの死は、自由へとつながる糸を強める。それが私が知るべきすべてだ」
languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの死は、自由へとつながる糸を強める。それが私が知るべきすべてだ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “他们的死亡会让通往自由的纽带变得更加坚韧，我只需要知道这些就够了。”
languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."

traits.locale_text: “他们的死亡会让通往自由的纽带变得更加坚韧，我只需要知道这些就够了。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Their deaths strengthen the thread that leads to freedom. That is all I need to know."
